scenario_text.value:
Hmm... I can’t say for sure, but there’s
a human child in there, no mistaking it.

(If the thing that kidnapped her is in there
with her, that’s...well, pretty scary.)

(I’m sure I’ll get snatched up if we just sit
around doing nothing. Perish the thought!)
Hold on, Aoi, we’ll definitely save you!
We’re coming to help you, Aoi!
